# Flex Item

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignSelf` | `align-self` | Defines how this flex item is aligned along the cross axis. This overwrites the cross axis alignment set by the container. Corresponds to the 'alignSelf' css property.          | `'center' \| 'auto' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'stretch' \| 'baseline' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'center' \| 'auto' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'stretch' \| 'baseline'>`                                                                                                                                      | `'auto'`    |
| `flex`      | `flex`       | The shorthand property for the combined definition of 'shrink', 'grow' and 'basis'                                                                                               | `'none' \| 'auto' \| 'initial' \| 'equal' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'none' \| 'auto' \| 'initial' \| 'equal'>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'initial'` |
| `grow`      | `grow`       | The ability to allow/disallow the flex child to grow.                                                                                                                            | `0 \| 1 \| BreakpointCustomizable<0 \| 1>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `0`         |
| `offset`    | `offset`     | The offset of the column. You can also supply values for specific breakpoints, like {base: 'none', l: 'one-quarter'}. You always need to provide a base value when doing this.   | `'none' \| 'one-quarter' \| 'one-third' \| 'half' \| 'two-thirds' \| 'three-quarters' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'none' \| 'one-quarter' \| 'one-third' \| 'half' \| 'two-thirds' \| 'three-quarters'>`                                                                       | `'none'`    |
| `shrink`    | `shrink`     | The ability to allow/disallow the flex child to shrink.                                                                                                                          | `0 \| 1 \| BreakpointCustomizable<0 \| 1>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `1`         |
| `width`     | `width`      | The width of the flex item. You can also supply values for specific breakpoints, like {base: 'full', l: 'one-quarter'}. You always need to provide a base value when doing this. | `'auto' \| 'one-quarter' \| 'one-third' \| 'half' \| 'two-thirds' \| 'three-quarters' \| 'full' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'auto' \| 'one-quarter' \| 'one-third' \| 'half' \| 'two-thirds' \| 'three-quarters' \| 'full'>` | `'auto'`    |
